encyclopedia.title: Afgaanse hond
encyclopedia.fact: This hound has long, silky hair.

encyclopedia.title: Dalmatiese hond
encyclopedia.fact: Known for its white coat with black spots.

encyclopedia.title: Dashond
encyclopedia.fact: This breed has a long body and short legs.

encyclopedia.title: Jagwindhond
encyclopedia.fact: This sighthound can run very fast.

encyclopedia.title: Bulhond
encyclopedia.fact: Bulldogs have a distinctive wrinkled face.

encyclopedia.title: Engelse Patryshond
encyclopedia.fact: English Pointers excel at bird hunting.

encyclopedia.title: Bloedhond
encyclopedia.fact: Bloodhounds have an exceptional sense of smell.

encyclopedia.title: Rhodesiese Rifrughond
encyclopedia.fact: This dog has a ridge of hair along its back.
